root.name: Pokémon Zany Cards
root.description: Wild Match Mode OpponentsJessie and JamesBrock and MistyLorelei and BrunoGary and RickyGiovanni and MewtwoSpecial Seven OpponentsJessie and JamesCasey and DuplicaKoga and SabrinaGiovanni and MewtwoTriviaRitchie's name is misspelled as Ricky in the game. When Brock mentions Nurse Joy, he calls her Ms. JoyDespite the game including characters originating in the anime, and the other characters behaving like their anime counterparts, the sprite used to represent the players is distinctively Red from Pokémon Red/Blue.Meowth is shown on the game's box art as playing the game, but Mewtwo is the only Pokémon to play in the game, itself. The other Pokémon show up on the cards and their effects as well as game menus.
